## IIcon.initView() method

Creates the SVG elements for the icon that will live on the block.

**Signature:**

```typescript
initView(pointerdownListener: (e: PointerEvent) => void): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

pointerdownListener


</td><td>

(e: PointerEvent) =&gt; void


</td><td>

An event listener that must be attached to the root SVG element by the implementation of `initView`<!-- -->. Used by Blockly's gesture system to properly handle clicks and drags.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void
